Designed for content creators, educators, and anyone looking to bring a dynamic edge to their web browsing experience. Our extension offers a unique way to animate text highlights on web pages, making it an indispensable tool for screen recordings, presentations, and educational content.

# Key Features:

1. Dynamic Text Highlighting:
   - Seamlessly highlight text on any webpage.
   - Bring attention to specific sections of content, perfect for tutorials, guides, and online teaching.

2. Customizable Animation Pace:
   - Choose from three animation paces: slow, moderate, and fast.
   - Tailor the speed of the highlight animation to match the context and tone of your content.

3. Color Customization:
   - Personalize your highlights with a spectrum of background and text colors.
   - Adapt the look to fit your brand, mood, or the specific needs of your content.

4. Intuitive Shortcuts:
   - Quick keyboard shortcuts to clear highlights, restart animations, and toggle highlighting functionality.
   - Enhance your workflow efficiency without breaking your focus.

5. User-Friendly Interface:
   - A clean, straightforward popup interface for easy access to all features.

# Ideal Use Cases:

- Content Creation: Add a layer of engagement to your video tutorials, walkthroughs, and educational content. Highlight key information as you navigate through web pages, making your content more accessible and easier to follow.

- Educational Purposes: Teachers and educators can use Hilight.ing to draw attention to important sections of online resources during virtual classes or presentations.

- Professional Presentations: During web-based presentations, use Hilight.ing to guide your audience's focus, ensuring they don't miss any critical information.

- Personal Browsing: Enhance your reading experience by highlighting and animating sections for personal reference or to increase focus on lengthy articles.
